item.title: Community call
item.description: Community call The Open Terms Archive Community Call is a monthly online meeting for and by the community. Ambitions ðŸ”— Get up-to-date: the core team will open the call by highlighting the latest features and updates. Discover collections: on each call, a maintainer will present their collection. Get support: the core team will be available to help you track and maintain existing collections. Frequency and format ðŸ”— When: First Wednesday of the month Time: 09:00 - 10:00 UTC Duration: 1 hour Join link: https://meet.
